reviewText: This DVD is nothing but people with PHD's plugging their books and websites mixed with commentaries full of metaphysical rhetoric.
This video ties it all together with scientific proof. What you thought and hoped was happening energetically is shown to be accurate.
What can I say 100% satisfied. As usual got it way early and, not even out of the wrapper, brand new.  :-)

David Sereda is a master at presenting positive info about the Spiritual potential and references for farther reading on the subject of our true nature...a must see for Believers in God working in our body 2010

After watching the DVD of The Voice many times (it's very interesting) - this was a disappointment.  In fact, much of this DVD was copied from The Voice and the parts that were not copied are dull.  The marketing comments regarding Quantum Communication should include, "if you've seen The Voice, no need to view this".  Quantum Communication is boring.
Thank you
Great, insightful, interesting. Everyone should watch this, It's fantastic.

One of the best introductions to the quantum physics genre of current info...

Peace, Love, Unity, Oneness.
great product

Sooooooo much info and from different modalities ....all in gathering proof that our world through the science we have depended ,entrusted on explaining our universe, Isnt what they thought AND IT WAS KNOWN ABOUT 100 YRS AGO. Just sit down and watch the truth of your life ....approx 2 1/2 hours  :)
This movie is a must to buy
very well thought out
Masterpiece!! seems that theres not many copies of this sometimes, but this is something you really should consider, Good education.

I have viewed this many times - actually worn out the first DVD and ordered another one. This is outstanding and profound.
This has to be "digested" - the information is deep.

Highly recommended.
good stuff like the others jimmy mack healing
Fantastically informative documentary. A wonderful look outside the modern, narrow, mainstream views. Lots to think about. David Sereda is my new hero.

I am writing this review as a Master NLP Practitioner. All I can say is that this video is astonishing. It goes to the edge of the envelope of human mind technology. In order to really understand this video you must have a clear concept of beliefs and what they really mean to us. This video challenges our entire belief system and goes totally against the establishment.
The information contained within it is priceless and will make wonder what are the possibilities of any individual. Science, metaphysics and physics intertwined into a single subject.

Above all it takes Universal Love seriously and shows its effect upon matter and energy!

Totally recommended!
Full of cutting edge science and well put together! It is both fascinating and inspiring. A must for people looking for the most recent science that verifies spiritual truths. Enjoy!
A great movie for those like me who are totally and completely into quantum physics and world of the unseen,

Great DVD, artistically and visually beautiful. Get your money's worth as it is 2 hours and 45 minutes long.  The voiceover is somewhat droning and hypnotic but the researcher interviews are facinating and absorbing.  Had  a group over for popcorn and to share this DVD; they all loved it.  You don't have to know anything about Quantum physics to understand or enjoy this DVD and the remarkable research that is occuring in the area of mind/body/environment connection.  I went to several of the featured speakers web sites and found them interesting; for example Heart Math and Dr. Tiller.  Good purchase, love it.

A refreshing change from the old debates of Newtonian Science vs Religion. 'Quantum Communication' explores the science behind universal non-physical intelligence, our own unrealized mental powers, and the relationship between the two. If you liked 'What the bleep' I recommend watching this.
Highly recommend for people to get some insight into what and where we are heading in this world today and tomorrow.
Would love to see a PAL format for this and many other DVD's from Amazon then we could all enjoy them. Dissapointed!

This was a very interesting DVD.  Some things I had already read about but much information was new.  My only negative criticism is that some of the speakers seemed to drone on at times in nearly a monotone voice.  Still, an interesting video for those interested in this sort of thing.

I found this dvd absolutely fascinating. It had so much new information for me that I feel I will watch it over and over, as there is so much to absorb. The implications of the varied knowledge shared in this dvd is inspiring, I highly recommend it.

All of this information is of utmost importance moving ahead in ones human personal development.  I so look forward to see what techniques are developed to teach us all how to use the powerful body we have created.
With the expansion of the internet making the world come to your home - why not look further into what is being studied about our quantum composition?
Loved this and I would recommend it to the world. It has helped me gain a better understanding of my potential-in a physical way and the energy that I possess.

I have had difficulity in understanding quantum ideas but this video makes
what I think could be a valid point/s.

If you are compelled to see this video, borrow it or get it at the library. The narrator is appallingly boring with a fake, over articulated accent. The info from the "real" scientists is good and I have read some of their work, but the video presents it in such a  boring way to render the info useless or unable to be applied by most people. Way too much emphasis was placed on finding a soul mate. The review claims it will help to communicate with the universe and bring our desires into manifestation. The video forgot to tell us how....

If everyone would watch this DVD, it might change the world.  It is cutting edge.  Just because it has the word "Quantum" in the title doesn't mean it is hard to understand.  It is very clear and very "life changing."

Fantastic video well put together "inspiring" information that is finally the true, we all have a right to be informed of our own Quantum communication and energy field, and the ability of our mind continuum that has been, withheld from the main stream leaving the general public lacking fundamental awareness of what and who they are, from the deceitful withholding for nothing more than power and control, it is available to all now the grace and truth of our being.

I loved this documentary because it proves, in living color & beautiful graphics, what Ascended-Master students already know; so many things about how the cosmos works!  It describes experiments that prove that we are automatically sending our thoughts and feelings into the collective consciousness all the time, and that any  strong thought or feeling can travel across the Cosmos in an instant and faster than the speed of light! It shows proof that our thoughts & feelings are more effectively sent than any electronic device, because they easily permiate even a lead wall, which electronic devices cannot.
  I got the feeling of how important it is to keep our thoughts & feelings positive; for it is a way to lift the collective consciousness of the entire planet; and that war and terror, even media events that many people watch either lift us up or drag us down, just by so many people participating in them with their attention and emotions.
  It even describes how you can clear your personal forcefield to attract the people
and the things you want to have appear in your life, such as a soul mate or business partner.
  So many physicists appear describing so many experiments that one has to view this DVD a few times to catch everything.  It's divided into Parts I & II; each part is about 90 minutes long. I highly recommend it!
This was a great documentary to watch and re-watch and share with others. It is organized in a great way with graphics that are suitable for the genre. It never stopped peaking my interest.
Great DVD Quantum communication  by  David Sereda  Thank
Delivery was on time everything was good about the seller the video did not impress me that much on something of that nature it just didn't have that wow
It's definitely not physical. Metaphysical, maybe? If you are looking for scientific coverage of cutting edge quantum communication development, this is not for you.
Glad to have purchased.  Great video.
It "jumps" around between topics and speakers. The content is provocative.
I found this DVD to be a lot on the boring side.  It would have been better if their had been a book I could have read instead.
Excellent
OMG this is awesome.
Amazing and facts right on. As a energy worker this puts it all together! A great teacher for new be's and a great renewing for the already seasoned person.
I thought this DVD was more than I expected. It made a lot of things clear to me.
